verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> that the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> shall <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H8462>first<s%> for us <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against them?"
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3063>"Judah<s%> shall <S%H5927>go<s%> up; <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

Then <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H5927>"Come<s%> up with me into the <S%H1486>territory<s%> <S%H1486>allotted<s%> me, that we may <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H3669>Canaanites;<s%> and I in <S%H1571>turn<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> with you into the <S%H1486>territory<s%> <S%H1486>allotted<s%> you." So <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> with him.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%> into their <S%H3027>hands;<s%> and they <S%H5221>defeated<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> at <S%H966>Bezek.<s%>
And they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H966>Adoni-bezek<s%> in Bezek and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against him and they <S%H5221>defeated<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites.<s%>

But Adoni-bezek <S%H5127>fled;<s%> and they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> him and <S%H270>caught<s%> him and <S%H7112>cut<s%> <S%H7112>off<s%> his <S%H931>thumbs<s%> and <S%H931>big<s%> <S%H931>toes.<s%> <S%H7272><s%>

And Adoni-bezek <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7657>"Seventy<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> with their <S%H931>thumbs<s%> and their <S%H931>big<s%> <S%H931>toes<s%> <S%H7272><s%> <S%H7112>cut<s%> <S%H7112>off<s%> used to <S%H3950>gather<s%> up [scraps] <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H7979>table;<s%> as I have <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H9608>repaid<s%> me." So they <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and he <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3920>captured<s%> it and <S%H5221>struck<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H7971>set<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>living<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> and in the <S%H5045>Negev<s%> and in the <S%H8219>lowland.<s%>

So <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> (now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>formerly<s%> [was] Kiriath-arba); and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H8344>Sheshai<s%> and <S%H289>Ahiman<s%> and <S%H8526>Talmai.<s%>

Then from <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%> (now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%> <S%H6440>formerly<s%> [was] Kiriath-sepher).

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The one <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5221>attacks<s%> Kiriath-sepher and <S%H3920>captures<s%> it, I will even <S%H5414>give<s%> him my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> for a <S%H802>wife.<s%>"

And <S%H6274>Othniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> Caleb's <S%H9512>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H3920>captured<s%> it; so he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> for a <S%H802>wife.<s%>

Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when she <S%H935>came<s%> [to him,] that she <S%H5496>persuaded<s%> him to <S%H7592>ask<s%> her father for a <S%H1>field.<s%> Then she <S%H7704>alighted<s%> from her <S%H6795>donkey,<s%> and <S%H2543>Caleb<s%> <S%H3612>said<s%> to her, <S%H559>"What<s%> do you want?"

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3051>"Give<s%> me a <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> you have <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>Negev,<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me also <S%H1543>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%>" So <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> her the <S%H5942>upper<s%> <S%H1543>springs<s%> and the <S%H8482>lower<s%> <S%H1543>springs.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>descendants<s%> of the <S%H7017>Kenite,<s%> Moses' father-in-law, <S%H5927>went<s%> up from the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H8558>palms<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H6166>Arad;<s%> and they <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> with the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Then <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> with <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>living<s%> in <S%H6857>Zephath,<s%> and <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> it. So the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2767>Hormah.<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> with its <S%H1366>territory<s%> and <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> with its <S%H1366>territory<s%> and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> with its <S%H1366>territory.<s%>

Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and they <S%H3423>took<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country;<s%> but they could not <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they had <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H7393>chariots.<s%>

Then they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> to <S%H3612>Caleb,<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H1696>promised;<s%> and he <S%H3423>drove<s%> out from <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak.<s%>

But the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> did not <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> so the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> have <S%H3427>lived<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
Likewise the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up against <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with them.
And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H8446>spied<s%> out <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> (now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H6440>formerly<s%> <S%H3870>Luz<s%>).

And the <S%H8104>spies<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3318>coming<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H7200>show<s%> us the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> and we will <S%H6213>treat<s%> you <S%H2617>kindly.<s%>"

So he <S%H7200>showed<s%> them the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> to the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and they <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> but they <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H7971>free.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> it <S%H3870>Luz<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is its <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

But <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> did not <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of Beth-shean and its <S%H1323>villages,<s%> or <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and its <S%H1323>villages,<s%> or the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> and its <S%H1323>villages,<s%> or the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2991>Ibleam<s%> and its <S%H1323>villages,<s%> or the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%> and its <S%H1323>villages;<s%> so the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H2974>persisted<s%> in <S%H3427>living<s%> in that <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2388>became<s%> <S%H2388>strong,<s%> that they <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> to <S%H4522>forced<s%> <S%H4522>labor,<s%> but they did not <S%H3423>drive<s%> them out <S%H3423>completely.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> did <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> who were <S%H3427>living<s%> in <S%H1507>Gezer;<s%> so the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them.

<S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> did not <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7003>Kitron,<s%> or the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5096>Nahalol;<s%> so the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them and <S%H1961>became<s%> subject to <S%H4522>forced<s%> <S%H4522>labor.<s%>

<S%H836>Asher<s%> did not <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5910>Acco,<s%> or the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> or of <S%H303>Ahlab,<s%> or of <S%H392>Achzib,<s%> or of <S%H2462>Helbah,<s%> or of <S%H663>Aphik,<s%> or of <S%H7340>Rehob.<s%>
So the <S%H843>Asherites<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> for they did not <S%H3423>drive<s%> them out.

<S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> did not <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of Beth-shemesh, or the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of Beth-anath, but <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of Beth-shemesh and Beth-anath <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H4522>forced<s%> <S%H4522>labor<s%> for them.

Then the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H3905>forced<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country,<s%> for they did not <S%H5414>allow<s%> them to <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6010>valley;<s%>

yet the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H2974>persisted<s%> in <S%H3427>living<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2776>Heres,<s%> in <S%H357>Aijalon<s%> and in <S%H8169>Shaalbim;<s%> but when the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3513>grew<s%> <S%H3513>strong,<s%> they <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H4522>forced<s%> <S%H4522>labor.<s%>
And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> ran from the <S%H4610>ascent<s%> of <S%H4610>Akrabbim,<s%> from <S%H5554>Sela<s%> and <S%H4605>upward.<s%>
